page.title: 12A COCKFIELD CHILD'S DAY 2
page.content: Lunch time play depends on when we finish our lunch.After lunch time play we have topic work;sometimes this is History,sometimes Geography and sometimes Science or Nature Study.The last lesson of the afternoon for the 5th years in winter time is woodwork.I made a ship and a car in wood this year.In the summer term the 5th years have gardening and I share a plot with Christina Warren and we grow flowers and vegetables.My friends Simon and Alistair belong to a gang as well as several others. I come home for tea between 6 p.m.and 7 p.m..After tea I go out until about 8.30 p.m.to play a game called "Spies".Then I come home and go to bed at 9.45 p.m.
